name: Heroku Internet Add/Remove Element Page Tests

steps.name: the user is on the Internet "add_remove_elements/" page

elements.name: User can create 1 many elements

steps.name: the user clicks the "Add Element" button 1 times
1 Delete elements exist on the page
the user is on the Internet "add_remove_elements/" page

elements.name: User can create 5 many elements

steps.name: the user clicks the "Add Element" button 5 times
5 Delete elements exist on the page
the user is on the Internet "add_remove_elements/" page

elements.name: User can create 0 many elements

steps.name: the user clicks the "Add Element" button 0 times
0 Delete elements exist on the page
the user is on the Internet "add_remove_elements/" page

elements.name: User can delete 1 many elements

steps.name: the user clicks the "Add Element" button 10 times
the user clicks the "Delete" button 1 times
9 Delete elements exist on the page
the user is on the Internet "add_remove_elements/" page

elements.name: User can delete 5 many elements

steps.name: the user clicks the "Add Element" button 10 times
the user clicks the "Delete" button 5 times
5 Delete elements exist on the page
the user is on the Internet "add_remove_elements/" page

elements.name: User can delete 0 many elements

steps.name: the user clicks the "Add Element" button 10 times
the user clicks the "Delete" button 0 times
10 Delete elements exist on the page

name: Heroku Internet Broken Images Page Tests

elements.name: The broken images should not load

steps.name: none of the broken images have loaded
the user is on the Internet "broken_images" page

elements.name: The Fork Me image should load

steps.name: the Fork me image should appear on the page

name: Heroku Internet Challenging DOM Page Tests

steps.name: the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The Challenging DOM page should display exactly 3 buttons

steps.name: there should be 3 button link elements on the page
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The alert button should have alert styling

steps.name: the alert button should have alert styling
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Lorem

steps.name: the "Lorem" header should exist in the table

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Ipsum

steps.name: the "Ipsum" header should exist in the table
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Dolor

steps.name: the "Dolor" header should exist in the table
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Sit

steps.name: the "Sit" header should exist in the table
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Amet

steps.name: the "Amet" header should exist in the table
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Diceret

steps.name: the "Diceret" header should exist in the table
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should have the correct header: Action

steps.name: the "Action" header should exist in the table
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The table should contain exactly 11 rows

steps.name: there should be 11 elements of type "tr" on the page
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: Every table row should contain both an edit and a delete link

steps.name: each table row should contain an edit and a delete link
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: The canvas element exists on the page

steps.name: the single canvas element is shown on the page
the "canvas" has height: 200
the "canvas" has width: 599
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: Table cell at row 1 and column 2 has correct text value: "Adipisci0"

steps.name: the cell 1, 2 has text "Adipisci0"
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: Table cell at row 1 and column 0 has correct text value: "Iuvaret0"

steps.name: the cell 1, 0 has text "Iuvaret0"
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: Table cell at row 4 and column 3 has correct text value: "Definiebas3"

steps.name: the cell 4, 3 has text "Definiebas3"
the user is on the Internet "challenging_dom" page

elements.name: Table cell at row 2 and column 5 has correct text value: "Phaedrum1"

steps.name: the cell 2, 5 has text "Phaedrum1"
the user is on the Internet "checkboxes" page

elements.name: User can toggle a checkbox value

steps.name: the number 1 checkbox should be "checked"
the number 0 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user clicks the number 0 checkbox
the number 0 checkbox should be "checked"
the user clicks the number 0 checkbox
the number 0 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user is on the Internet "checkboxes" page

elements.name: User can toggle a checkbox value

steps.name: the number 1 checkbox should be "checked"
the number 0 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user clicks the number 1 checkbox
the number 1 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user clicks the number 1 checkbox
the number 1 checkbox should be "checked"
the user is on the Internet "checkboxes" page

elements.name: The checkbox page saves state between soft refreshes

steps.name: the user clicks the number 1 checkbox
the number 1 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user refreshes the page softly
the number 1 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user is on the Internet "checkboxes" page

elements.name: The checkbox page does NOT save state between hard refreshes

steps.name: the user clicks the number 1 checkbox
the number 1 checkbox should be "unchecked"
the user refreshes the page hard
the number 1 checkbox should be "checked"

name: Heroku Internet Context Menu Page Tests

steps.name: the user is on the Internet "context_menu" page

elements.name: The dotted box displays an alert when right clicked

steps.name: the "hot-spot" element is right clicked
an alert is displayed on the page

name: The Internet Disappearing Elements Page Tests

steps.name: the user is on the Internet "disappearing_elements" page

elements.name: The page opens and Menu exists

steps.name: the menu exists
the "a" element with text "Home" exists
the "a" element with text "About" exists
the "a" element with text "Contact Us" exists
the "a" element with text "Portfolio" exists
the user is on the Internet "disappearing_elements" page

elements.name: The Gallery link sometimes exists

steps.name: the gallery sometimes appears on the page
the user is on the Internet "disappearing_elements" page

elements.name: The "Home" button redirect to correct page

steps.name: the user clicks the "Home" button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/"
the user is on the Internet "disappearing_elements" page

elements.name: The "About" button redirect to correct page

steps.name: the user clicks the "About" button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/about/"
the user is on the Internet "disappearing_elements" page

elements.name: The "Contact Us" button redirect to correct page

steps.name: the user clicks the "Contact Us" button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/contact-us/"
the user is on the Internet "disappearing_elements" page

elements.name: The "Portfolio" button redirect to correct page

steps.name: the user clicks the "Portfolio" button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/portfolio/"

name: heroku Internet Drag and Drop Page Tests

steps.name: the user is on the Internet "drag_and_drop" page

elements.name: The user can drag the A card onto the B card

steps.name: the user drags the "A" card onto the "B" card
the "B" card displays "A"
the user is on the Internet "drag_and_drop" page

elements.name: The user can drag the B card onto the A card

steps.name: the user drags the "B" card onto the "A" card
the "A" card displays "B"
the user is on the Internet "drag_and_drop" page

elements.name: The cards do not change if the user drops a card outside a card holder

steps.name: the user drags the "A" onto empty space
the "A" card displays "A"
the "B" card displays "B"
the user is on the Internet "drag_and_drop" page

elements.name: The cards do not change if the user drops a card outside a card holder

steps.name: the user drags the "B" onto empty space
the "A" card displays "A"
the "B" card displays "B"

name: Heroku Internet Form Auth Feature Tests

steps.name: the user is on the Internet "login" page

elements.name: User can log in successfully and then logout successfully

steps.name: the user enters their username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"
the user clicks the login button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/secure"
the user clicks the "Logout" button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login"
the user is on the Internet "login" page

elements.name: User cannot log in with invalid credentials -- username: "wrong" and password: "1234"

steps.name: the user enters their username "wrong" and password "1234"
the user clicks the login button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login"
a banner shows the reject text: "Your username is invalid!"
the user is on the Internet "login" page

elements.name: User cannot log in with invalid credentials -- username: "" and password: ""

steps.name: the user enters their username "" and password ""
the user clicks the login button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login"
a banner shows the reject text: "Your username is invalid!"
the user is on the Internet "login" page

the user clicks the login button
the user is navigated to the "https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login"
a banner shows the reject text: "Your password is invalid!"
the user is on the Internet "login" page
